name: Killer Krampus
description:
Killer krampus is a two player local multiplayer game.

The elves are trying to make toys to give out this Christmas but Krampus isn't having any of it.

Try to make the toys on the list without being caught by Krampus.
Un-painted toys are sent down the conveyer belt on the right hand side, it's up to the Elf to paint them.

Krampus must aim to kill the elf and stop them making presents.

Krampus can sabotage the paint machines meaning they will need to be repaired before they can be used by the Elf.

Be careful as the Elf only has three lives to deliver as many presents as possible.

Controls Elf

The Elf is controlled by using the WASD keys to move around.
E is used to interact with the level, it controls :

  • Picking up items.
  • Colouring held items when next to a paint machine.
  • Repairing the broken machines when not holding and item.

Q is used to drop any items you are holding (best to do this before repairing the machines).

Krampus

Krampus is controlled with the arrow keys to move around the level.

Krampus can press right ctrl to sabotage the paint machines.
